JobFullDesc:
About the Role 
We’re looking for a junior IT Support person that will help us to scale our growing employee base. As our first dedicated IT hire in New York City, you will be the first contact for local and remote Latticians for all their computer questions. Beside this you are also going to be responsible for onboarding new hires.
IT Support needs to be compassionate and detail oriented, together with senior staff you’ll be looking for solutions that make our users happy while meeting IT and Security requirements.
You’ll get exposure to all the Enterprise technologies Lattice uses and be an important part of every ongoing IT project. There is plenty of opportunity to learn and grow in a small team.
Responsibilities

Troubleshooting Mac hardware and software
Providing support for GSuite, Okta, etc. over Slack, Zoom or in person
Successfully onboarding new hires from account creation to training
Creating documentation and FAQs
Supporting Audio/Video during company events
Coordinate processes with other teams like People Ops and Engineering

Qualifications

1-2 years initial experience in IT
Basic network knowledge (Wifi)
Attention to detail
Service oriented
Eager to learn new technologies and processes

Nice to have 

Some experience with Videoconferencing/ broadcasted events would be ideal

Some projects you might work on

Roll out new software and solutions to users
Further automate new hire experience
Future office build outs

Why Lattice?

We invest in the personal and professional growth of every employee because we believe growth leads to both business impact and personal fulfillment
The opportunity to join an experienced and ambitious team that is passionate about solving customers’ needs and loves coming to work every day
Partner with 2,750+ companies around the world to make sure their employees are engaged and performing at a high level
A culture that encourages and promotes professional growth and development, with continuous learning reimbursements
Competitive salary, equity, and benefits
Centrally located FiDi office
Flexible vacation/time-off policy

About Lattice
Lattice is on a mission to build cultures where employees and their companies thrive.  In an age where innovation is happening all around us, there's commonality – people are driving these changes. We offer a solution that helps companies put employees first. Lattice is a people management tool that offers performance reviews, employee engagement surveys, real-time feedback, weekly check-ins, and goal setting in a way that allows companies to focus on employee development, growth, and engagement. Since launching in 2016 we have grown to over 2,750+ customers globally, including brands like Slack, WeWork, Reddit, Glossier, and Asana.
